ComicInfo.Summary:
The race to capture the rare gemstone known as the “Eye of Judgment” continues – has brought both the crews of the noble Venture and the villainous Resolve to the Lost Land of Caspak! But as they press on into the interior of the island, they’ll have to deal with the dangers of the native prehistoric flora and fauna – that is to say, the DINOSAURS!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Cary Nord | 1 | B | Cover B | Patrick Zircher (a) & Kim Mohan (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Roberto Castro (a) & Omi Remalante (c) | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Cary Nord | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Patrick Zircher | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Roberto Castro | 6 |
